ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Područja
ui.panel.config.areas.description: Pregled svih područja u vašem domu.
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Područja se koriste za organiziranje gdje su uređaji. Ove informacije će se koristiti u cijelom ioBroker da vam pomogne u organizaciji sučelja, dopuštenja i integracija s drugim sustavima.
Da biste postavili uređaje u neko područje, pomoću donje veze idite na stranicu s integracijama, a zatim kliknite na konfiguriranu integraciju da biste došli do kartica uređaja.

ui.panel.config.energy.caption: Energy
ui.panel.config.energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.new_device_info: After setting up a new device, it can take up to 2 hours for new data to arrive in your energy dashboard.
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_source: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_integratio: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? It will remove the entities it provides
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Electricity grid
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows ioBroker to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total received money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Solar panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let ioBroker monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.head: Configure solar panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Home battery storage
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.
Energy going in to the battery
Energy coming out of the battery
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.title: Gas consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.sub: Let ioBroker monitor your gas usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.paragr: Gas consumption is measured either as the volume of gas that flows to your home or as the amount of energy contained in the gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.entity: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.note_p: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_p: Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_s: Use an entity tracking the total costs
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_e: Use an entity with current price
ui.panel.config.energy.water.title: Potrošnja vode
ui.panel.config.energy.water.sub: Neka ioBroker nadzire vašu potrošnju vode.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.learn_more: Više informacija o tome kako započeti.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.head: Konfigurirajte potrošnju vode
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.para: Potrošnja plina je količina vode koja teče u vaš dom.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures water consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.cost: Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed water.
Use an entity tracking the total costs

ui.panel.config.energy.device_consumptio: Tracking the energy usage of individual devices allows ioBroker to break down your energy usage by device.
More information on how to get started.

Select the energy sensor that measures the device's energy usage in either of {unit}.

Update the unit of all sensors

The unit of sensors will be updated
The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed will be updated.

ui.panel.config.voice_assistants.assista: Give your assistant a name and select your language. Depending on this language, you may be able to choose region specific variants below.
The conversation agent is the brains of your assistant and will process the incoming text commands.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the speech-to-text engine turns your voice command into text.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the text-to-speech engine turns the conversation text responses into audio.
You should have an active cloud subscription to use cloud speech services.
Control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled or Alexa-enabled device.
Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you using our neural-network powered speech-to-text and text-to-speech services.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacija
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatizacijski urednik omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje automatizacije. Molimo pročitajte [upute] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali ioBroker.

ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Upravljajte kad ste izvan kuće, integrirajte se s Alexa i Google Assistantom.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Prijava putem clouda
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud vam pruža sigurnu udaljenu vezu s vašom instancom dok ste izvan kuće. Također vam omogućuje povezivanje s uslugama samo u cloudu: Amazon Alexa i Google Assistant.
, tvrtka koju su osnovali osnivači ioBrokera i Hass.ioa.
ioBroker Cloud je usluga na pretplatu s besplatnim probnim razdobljem od mjesec dana. Nisu potrebne informacije o plaćanju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.start_trial: Započnite besplatno probno razdoblje od 1 mjeseca
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Prije prijave morate potvrditi svoj e-mail.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.cloud_pipeli: Want to use ioBroker Cloud for your voice assistant?
We created a new assistant for you, using the superior text-to-speech and speech-to-text engines from ioBroker Cloud. Would you like to set this assistant as the preferred assistant?
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Unesite svoju e-mail adresu i poslat ćemo vam link za resetiranje lozinke.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Provjerite e-poštu za upute o resetiranju zaporke.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Registrirajte račun
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Započnite besplatno probno razdoblje
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Izradite račun da biste započeli besplatno jednomjesečno probno razdoblje uz ioBroker Cloud. Nisu potrebni podaci o plaćanju.
Probna verzija će vam omogućiti pristup svim prednostima ioBroker Clouda, uključujući:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Jednostavna integracija s aplikacijama temeljenim na webhooku kao što je OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: , tvrtka koju su osnovali osnivači Tvrtke ioBroker.
Registracijom računa prihvaćate sljedeće uvjete i odredbe.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Račun kreiran! Provjerite svoju e-poštu za upute o aktiviranju računa.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Hvala vam što ste dio ioBroker Clouda. Zahvaljujući ljudima poput vas, u mogućnosti smo napraviti sjajno iskustvo automatizacije doma za svakoga. Hvala vam!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Jeste li sigurni da se želite odjaviti?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integracije za ioBroker Cloud omogućuju vam povezivanje s uslugama u oblaku bez potrebe da svoju instancu ioBrokera izlažete javno na internetu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tip_moved_: Looking for Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa settings? They are moved to the new voice assistants page.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text-to-speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our text-to-speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Daljinsko upravljanje je u pripremi. Obavijestit ćemo vas kada bude spremno.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.cer: Your certificate is loaded, waiting for validation.
There was an error generating the certificate, check your logs.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud pruža sigurnu daljinsku vezu s vašom instancom dok ste izvan kuće.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Vaša će instanca biti dostupna na
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.manu: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Prije nego što možete koristiti Alexu, morate aktivirati vještinu Kućnog pomoćnika za Alexu (ioBroker skill for Alexa) u aplikaciji Alexa.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.expo: Should new entities be exposed to Alexa automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud, you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google uređaji neće moći lokalno razgovarati s ioBrokerom jer ste konfigurirali SSL certifikat za svoju HTTP integraciju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: Ako omogućite izvješćivanje o stanju, ioBroker će poslati Googleu sve promjene stanja izloženih entiteta. To ubrzava glasovne naredbe i omogućuje vam da uvijek vidite najnovija stanja u aplikaciji Google.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Unesite PIN za interakciju sa sigurnosnim uređajima. Sigurnosni uređaji su vrata, garažna vrata i brave. Od vas će se tražiti da izgovorite/unesete ovaj PIN kada komunicirate s takvim uređajima putem Google asistenta.
Unesite PIN za korištenje sigurnosnih uređaja
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.man: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.exp: Should new entities be exposed to Google Assistant automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Svemu što je konfigurirano da ga pokreće webhook može se dati javno dostupan URL koji vam omogućuje slanje podataka natrag ioBrokeru s bilo kojeg mjesta, bez izlaganja svoje instance internetu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Čini se da još nemate webhookove. Započnite konfiguriranjem
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Saznajte više o stvaranju automatizacija koje pokreće webhook.

ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.i: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can

ui.panel.config.devices.caption: Uređaji
ui.panel.config.devices.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.devices.enabled_descript: Disabled devices will not be shown and entities belonging to the device will be disabled and not added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.devices.automation.no_de: Nema dostupnih automatizacija za ovaj uređaj.
ui.panel.config.devices.cant_edit: Možete uređivati samo stavke stvorene u korisničkom sučelju (UI).
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Želite li također preimenovati ID entiteta svojih entiteta?
This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!

ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entiteti
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker drži registar svakog entiteta koji je ikada vidio da se može jedinstveno identificirati. Svaki od tih entiteta imat će dodijeljeni ID entiteta koji će biti rezerviran za samo ovaj entitet.

Koristite registar entiteta da biste nadjačali naziv, promijenili ID entiteta ili uklonili stavku iz ioBroker. Napomena, uklanjanjem unosa registra entiteta neće se ukloniti entitet. Da biste to učinili, slijedite donju vezu i uklonite je s stranice integracije.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in ioBroker again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: You should remove them from your dashboard config and automations if they contain these entities.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart ioBroker before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.

ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can add each person of interest in ioBroker.

ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zone
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Upravljajte zonama u kojima želite pratiti osobe.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on Earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Izgleda da još niste stvorili nijednu zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati ovu zonu?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: Zone konfigurirane putem configuration.yaml ne mogu se uređivati putem korisničkog sučelja.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: Položaj vašeg doma može se promijeniti u globalnoj konfiguraciji.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Ikona treba biti u obliku prefiksa: ime ikone, na primjer: mdi: home
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Dodajte korisnika
Manage the OAuth application credentials used by Integrations
OAuth is used to grant ioBroker access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
Public identifier of the OAuth application
Application credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.

ui.panel.config.thread.no_preferred_netw: You don't have a preferred network yet.

ui.panel.config.thread.no_routers_otbr_n: No border routers where found, maybe the border router is not configured correctly. You can try to reset it to the factory settings.
ui.panel.config.thread.confirm_reset_bor: This will reset the ioBroker border router to its factory defaults and form a new Thread network. The old network may no longer be available, and any devices that were attached to this network may need to be recomissioned.
ui.panel.config.thread.confirm_set_datas: This will reconfigure the ioBroker border router to use a different Thread network. The old network may no longer be available, and any devices that were attached to this network may need to be recomissioned.

ui.panel.config.thread.change_channel_mu: The Thread radio has multiprotocol enabled
To change channel when the Thread radio has multiprotocol enabled, please use the hardware settings menu.
ui.panel.config.thread.change_channel_ra: Channel must be in the range 11 to 26
ui.panel.config.thread.change_channel_te: Initiate a channel change for your Thread networks. This is an advanced operation and can leave your Thread networks inoperable if the new channel is congested. Depending on existing network conditions, many of your devices may not migrate to the new channel and will require re-joining before they start working again. Use with caution.
ui.panel.config.zha.configuration_page.c: Zigbee and Thread share the same radio and must use the same channel. Change the channel of both networks by reconfiguring multiprotocol from the hardware menu.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while ioBroker is searching.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.stati: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller
Number of messages successfully received by the controller
Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host
Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent
Number of messages that the controller did not accept
Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller
Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller
Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time
Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_statistics: # of commands successfully sent to the node
# of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands
# of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent
# of commands from the node that were dropped by the host
# of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time
Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node
Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.route_statistic: The used data rate for this route
Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI
The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller
The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.choose: How do you want to add your device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.qr_cod: If your device supports SmartStart you can scan the QR code for easy pairing.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The device could not be added.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.check_: Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.provis: The device has been added. Once you power it on, it will become available.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.interv: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.provisioned.con: Jeste li sigurni da želite deaktivirati uređaj?
Ako deaktivirate uređaj, neće biti dodan u ioBroker kada se uključi. Ako je već dodan u ioBroker, uklanjanjem dodijeljenog uređaja neće se ukloniti iz ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.security_classe: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included
Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems
Example: Door locks and garage doors
Example: Legacy door locks without S2 support
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The ioBroker and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?

WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The ioBroker and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
Ažuriranje je uspjelo. Kontroler se ponovno pokreće i mreža će privremeno biti nedostupna

ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.title: Move data disk
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.descrip: You are currently using ''{current_path}'' as data disk. Moving the data disk will reboot your device and it's estimated to take {time} minutes. Your ioBroker installation will not be accessible during this period. Do not disconnect the power during the move!
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.no_devi: There is no suitable external device found. The storage capacity of the external data disk must be larger than the storage capacity of the existing disk
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.moving_: Rebooting and moving data disk. Please have patience
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.n: The operating system does not support network storage
Network storage is not supported on this host
To use network storage you need to run at least ioBroker Operating System {version}
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.o: Name
This name will be shown to you in the UI, and will also be the name of the folder created on your system
Remote share
This is the name of the share you created on your storage server
Server
This is the domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the storage server you want to connect to
Default backup location
This will be the default location for backups
Remote share path
This is the path of the remote share on your storage server
Protocol
This determines how to communicate with the storage server
Usage
This determines how the share is intended to be used
Samba/Windows (CIFS) version
This choses the version of the protocol to use
Username
This is your username for the samba share
Password
This is your password for the samba share
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.e: Invalid name, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.w: The selected CIFS version is not recommended to use, you should only use this if you have problems with auto and your server does not support version 2.1 or newer
ui.panel.config.system_health.caption: System health
ui.panel.config.system_health.descriptio: Status, metrics and integration startup time
